summary.p: New Year's greetings to Stumpf, his wife [Regula Brennwald], and family.

Enclosed, Bullinger sends [the draft of a letter to Aegidius Tschudi], which he received from Joachim Vadian. He kindly requests a copy of this letter or the autograph itself, noting that he would be more pleased with a copy in Stumpf's handwriting.

div.p: H. Bullinger to Johannes Stumpf, greetings. I wish you, your dear wife Regula, and all your family a most prosperous year.

I am sending here what I received from Joachim Vadian. However, I kindly ask you to either give me a copy of that letter, so that I may have it in your handwriting, or the autograph of Vadian himself, which would not be as pleasing as if you were to write it for me.
